points.title: You waive your moral rights

case.title: You waive your moral rights
case.localized_title: Vous renoncez à vos droits moraux
case.description:
Moral rights are rights to creators of literary, dramatic, musical and artistic works, as well as directors of films.

"The moral rights include the right of attribution, the right to have a work published anonymously or pseudonymously, and the right to the integrity of the work. The preserving of the integrity of the work allows the author to object to alteration, distortion, or mutilation of the work that is "prejudicial to the author's honor or reputation". Anything else that may detract from the artist's relationship with the work even after it leaves the artist's possession or ownership may bring these moral rights into play. Moral rights are distinct from any economic rights tied to copyrights. Even if an artist has assigned his or her copyright rights to a work to a third party, he or she still maintains the moral rights to the work." -Wikipedia

In general, any terms that use the exact words "moral rights" as rights that are waived will fall under this Case.

points.title: The service informs users that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites

case.title: The service informs you that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites
case.localized_title: Le service informe les utilisateurs que sa politique de confidentialité ne s'applique pas aux sites web de tiers
case.description: The service states that whenever it links to third party websites or applications, its privacy policy does not apply. Those third party websites or applications hosted or operated by other organizations may have their own privacy policies.

points.title: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder

case.title: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder
case.localized_title: La nullité d'une partie des conditions d'utilisation n'entraîne pas la nullité de la partie restante
case.description: Should any portion of the Terms of Service be unenforceable or invalid, that portion will be enforced to the fullest extent permitted by applicable law and the remainder of the TOS will remain valid and enforceable.

points.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

case.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account
case.localized_title: Vous êtes responsable du maintien de la sécurité de votre compte et des activités qui s'y déroulent
case.description: You are responsible for protecting the confidentiality of your password and for maintaining the security of your account. Any activity occurring under your account is your responsibility, whether authorized by you or not.

points.title: Failure to enforce any provision of the Terms of Service does not constitute a waiver of such provision

case.title: Failure to enforce any provision of the Terms of Service does not constitute a waiver of such provision
case.localized_title: Le fait de ne pas appliquer une disposition des conditions d'utilisation ne constitue pas une renonciation à cette disposition.
case.description: Even if the service does not or not always enforce all of the rules or provisions contained in its terms, they still apply. Users can at a later time still be held accountable for violating provisions that have not been enforced consistently.

points.title: When the service wants to make a material change to its terms, users are notified at least 30 days in advance

case.title: When the service wants to make a material change to its terms, you are notified at least 30 days in advance
case.localized_title: Lorsque le service souhaite apporter une modification substantielle à ses conditions, les utilisateurs en sont informés au moins 30 jours à l'avance.
case.description: The service may update the Terms without notice, but if they significantly change the agreements in a manner that importantly and/or negatively affects the way the service is used, users will be notified at least 30 days in advance.

points.title: This service does not condone any ideas contained in its user-generated contents

case.title: This service does not condone any ideas contained in its user-generated contents
case.localized_title: Ce service ne cautionne aucune idée contenue dans les contenus générés par les utilisateurs.

points.title: You can opt out of promotional communications

case.title: You can opt out of promotional communications
case.localized_title: Vous pouvez refuser les communications promotionnelles
case.description: You can update your account preferences and/or easily unsubscribe of email/sms lists to stop receiving promotional communications.

points.title: If you are the target of a copyright holder's take down notice, this service gives you the opportunity to defend yourself

case.title: If you are the target of a copyright holder's take down notice, this service gives you the opportunity to defend yourself
case.localized_title: Si vous êtes la cible d'un avis de retrait de la part d'un détenteur de droits d'auteur, ce service vous donne la possibilité de vous défendre.
case.description: You have the right to send a counter-notice to the service if you believe the content that was removed wasn't infringing any copyright.

points.title: This service collects your IP address for location use

case.title: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
case.localized_title: Ce service recueille votre adresse IP à des fins de localisation.

points.title: This service keeps a license on user-generated content even after users close their accounts.

case.title: A license is kept on user-generated content even after you close your account
case.localized_title: Ce service conserve une licence sur les contenus générés par les utilisateurs, même après la fermeture de leur compte.
case.description: The service may still use your content and display it after you stopped using it by closing your account. The case applies to terms requiring users to grant them a perpetual license over that content.

points.title: This service can license user content to third parties

case.title: Your content can be licensed to third parties
case.localized_title: Ce service peut concéder des licences sur le contenu des utilisateurs à des tiers
case.description: By posting content through the Services, users grant them a transferable and/or sublicensable right, which allows user content to be licensed to third parties.

points.title: The service has a no refund policy

case.title: The service has a no refund policy
case.localized_title: Le service est soumis à une politique de non-remboursement
case.description: Payments are final and can't be refunded unless required by law.

points.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk

case.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk
case.localized_title: Le service est fourni "en l'état" et doit être utilisé aux seuls risques des utilisateurs.
case.description: This service does not provide any guarantees as to its usability or fitness for the users' purposes. Users agree to use it at their own risk, accepting any possible bugs, malfunctions or harm to their devices.

points.title: This service requires first-party cookies, which are cookies that only belong to the domain of the service and not a third party.

case.title: First-party cookies are used
case.localized_title: Ce service nécessite des cookies de première partie, c'est-à-dire des cookies qui appartiennent uniquement au domaine du service et non à une tierce partie.
case.description: First-party cookies only belong to the domain of the service and not a third party.

points.title: The service has non-exclusive use to your content
points.analysis: Full quote: "You hereby grant to Kahoot! a perpetual (or, for as long as permitted under applicable law), non-exclusive, sub-licensable, transferable, royalty-free, irrevocable, fully paid, universal license to commercialize, use, reproduce, make available to the public (e.g. perform or display), publish, translate, modify, create derivative works from, and distribute any of your User Content you have made available to the public in connection with the Service through any medium, whether alone or in combination with other content or materials, in any manner and by any means, method or technology, whether now known or hereafter created."

case.title: The service has non-exclusive use of your content
case.localized_title: Le service dispose d'un droit d'utilisation non exclusif de votre contenu
case.description: The service can pay for your content and you are allowed to make it commercially available to other services/parties.

points.title: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics

case.title: Third-party cookies are used for statistics
case.localized_title: Ce service utilise des cookies de tiers pour les statistiques
case.description: For instance, Google Analytics, rather than self-hosted (first-party) statistics software.

points.title: You authorise the service to charge a credit card supplied on re-occurring basis

case.title: You authorise the service to charge a credit card supplied on re-occurring basis
case.localized_title: Vous autorisez le service à débiter une carte de crédit fournie sur une base récurrente.
case.description: You card will be billed on recurring basis unless cancelled. For instance, monthly or annual subscriptions.

points.title: This service employs a broad copyright license over user content including the right to distribute through any media

case.title: Your content can be distributed through any media known now or in the future
case.localized_title: Ce service utilise une large licence de droit d'auteur sur le contenu de l'utilisateur, y compris le droit de le distribuer par le biais de n'importe quel média.

points.title: This service gathers information about you through third parties

case.title: Information is gathered about you through third parties
case.localized_title: Ce service recueille des informations sur vous par l'intermédiaire de tiers
case.description: This Service may employ, either identifiable or non-identifiable, data collection from third party sources about you.

points.title: The service can delete specific content without reason and may do it without prior notice

case.title: Specific content can be deleted without reason and may be removed without prior notice
case.localized_title: Le service peut supprimer un contenu spécifique sans raison et peut le faire sans préavis
case.description: This service can delete specific content. Usually they will claim they reserve the right to do it at their sole discretion, which is legalese for saying they won't give a specific reason. If the terms say they will not notify you, it shall be included in the quote but if it does not explicitly say they will give you a notice, it can be reasonably inferred that they can do it without telling you.
